page.title: 10SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: With the opening of the new sports hall at Beechwood Park School we are able to play many sports.It contains 2 squash courts,cricket nets and courts for badminton,volleyball or tennis.We also have a large paddock and playing fields behind the school.In the autumn term we play soccer.In the Lent term we play rugby and to a lesser degree hockey and cross-country.The summer term's main sport is cricket but there is also tennis,swimming and athletics for which we have inter-house competitions.The major sports;rugby, soccer and cricket have about 2 fixtures a week.Other sports played on a free-time basis are basketball,golf and water-polo.For some of these sports hard training is done for good results.
